Legend

  • Red Axis: TOP
  • Green Axis: FRONT
  • Blue Axis: LEFT
  • Press A to toggle axis helper
  • Press H to get the list of all commands

Move notations

Use these keys to move

  • Layer Moves: R(right), F(front), U(up), L(left), B(back), D(down)
  • Slice Moves: S(b/w front & back), M(b/w left & right), E(b/w up & down)
  • Rotations: X, Y, Z
  • Clock wise: lowercase r, Counter Clock wise: uppercase R
  • Press Q to scramble the cube
